thread.title: Brexit & Beyond: Europe’s Largest Economy Cools Sharply

author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond: Europe’s Largest Economy Cools Sharply
text: To subscribe to the newsletter, please sign up here MUST READS Labor Issues Interrupt Germany’s Economic Boom: Europe’s largest economy cooled sharply in the first quarter amid a bad spell of illness and labor disputes, mirroring similar developments in the region and denting hopes for another year of stellar growth rates.
